Package edu.nyu.cs.cs101.consumers

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Colorable
    The colorable interface guarantees that an object will have color related attributes that can be accessed using the following getter/setter methods.
    Drawable
    Classes that are "Drawable" mean that they can be drawn using a processing PApplet object that has been already instantiated with a valid canvas to draw on.
    Expandable
    Some objects can grow or shrink at a specific rate.
    Movable  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ball
    The Ball class is based on a generic GeometricObject and has agreed to implement the Colorable and Drawable interfaces so that code using the Ball class can check if it's an instance of those interfaces and be sure that those methods are defined.
    ConsumingBall
    A ConsumingBall is a Ball that is always accelerating in the direction of the closest ball.
    Driver
    This is a simple game.
    EvadingBall
    An EvadignBall is a Ball that is always trying to move in the direction away from the nearest ball to it.
    ExpandableBall
    An ExpandableBall is a ball that implements the Expandable interface.
    GeometricObject
    Base class for various other geometric objects.
    IntelligentBall
    An intelligent ball is a Ball that: Tries to accelerate towards smaller balls that are near it (to consume them) Tries to accelerate away from larger balls that are near it (to evade them) TODO: All Intelligent balls should be blue by default TODO: Write this entire class.
